column1: There has been a development in the UK #COVID19 situation. Person to person (in the UK) has been reported.

WHO have just raises the risk assessment for coronavirus to "very high" at global level. A UK citizen has now died from #COVID19; He was a passager on the Diamond Princess cruise ship, I won't name him on her until I know for sure the family have been informed.

How well do you feel @BorisJohnson's GOV is handling #covid19UK?  
Follow @mi6rogue for the latest on #COVIDãƒ¼19 #coronavirus #Covid_19
